description: Injects current local time as context on every user prompt

hooks.command: node -e "const d=new Date();const off=-d.getTimezoneOffset();const sign=off>=0?'+':'-';const pad=n=>String(Math.abs(n)).padStart(2,'0');const tz=sign+pad(Math.floor(off/60))+':'+pad(off%60);const iso=d.getFullYear()+'-'+pad(d.getMonth()+1)+'-'+pad(d.getDate())+'T'+pad(d.getHours())+':'+pad(d.getMinutes())+':'+pad(d.getSeconds())+tz;console.log('The current local time is: '+iso+'. This is the latest source of truth for time; do not attempt to get the time any other way.')"
